remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Ensure ADF is not required for en route or approach procedures.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LEFT and/or RIGHT ADF INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
